snippet: Fund managers and institutional investors expect oil giant Saudi Aramco to have a market capitalization of $1 trillion to $1.5 trillion when it sells shares to the public next year, a survey by regional investment bank EFG Hermes showed on Monday....

headline.main: Opening a New Chapter at India's 'Grandmothers' School'
headline.print_headline: Opening a New Chapter at India's 'Grandmothers' School'

lead_paragraph: Fund managers and institutional investors expect oil giant Saudi Aramco to have a market capitalization of $1 trillion to $1.5 trillion when it sells shares to the public next year, a survey by regional investment bank EFG Hermes showed on Monday.
